public class DNSCollectionImpl
extends DNSComponentImpl

Implements a "collection" of components, of possibly different types, that we just want to propagate deployment or actions over them transparently.

See Also:
Serialized Form

sfDeployWith

public void sfDeployWith(org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription parent,
                         org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Context ctx)
                  throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException
The "real" constructor of this component. It will recursively try to instantiate and configure all the components passed in its context.

Specified by:
sfDeployWith in interface DNSComponent
Overrides:
sfDeployWith in class DNSComponentImpl
Parameters:
parent - A parent in the description hierarchy.
ctx - A context from which to obtain arguments to configure this object.
Throws:
SmartFrogException - if an error occurs while initializing this component or any of its sub-components.
